member.name: N:Accord.Extensions
member.summary: The core namespace of the Accord.NET Extensions Framework. Contains classes needed for other libraries such as: collections, structures, structures for parallel processing and extensions shared across libraries.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.BinaryTree
member.summary: Contains extension methods to simulate binary tree by using list and array collections.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.Caching
member.summary: Contains structures for memory lazy caching and method caching.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.Imaging
member.summary: The namespace is shared across several packages. Contains extensions which include: AForge interoperability extensions and algorithms which are mostly written in a form of an extension.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Filters
member.summary: Contains a subset of imaging algorithms which belong to a "Filter" category.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Moments
member.summary: Provides classes for calculating image moments.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.Imaging.Algorithms.LINE2D
member.summary: Implements template matching algorithm (~20x faster than conventional sliding window approach). The name 'LINE-2D' from the term 'Linearized Memory Maps' and '2D' refers to non-depth-extended version.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.Math
member.summary: Provides extensions for the 2D array. Implements parallel FFT transform. Implements group matching.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.Math.Geometry
member.summary: Provides structures and extensions for the graphs, contour, point transformations.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.Statistics
member.summary: Provides structures and extensions for calculating statistics over data. Implements running statistics extensions.

member.name: N:Accord.Extensions.Statistics.Filters
member.summary: Implements the following algorithms: Discrete Kalman filter, Particle filtering (as extension), Joint-Probability data association filter (as extension). Provides motion models.
